thread.section_title: Firmoo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Firmoo | www.firmoo.com
thread.title: FoxxyRoxy Debose

author: FoxxyRoxy Debose
title: FoxxyRoxy Debose
text: The fit is perfect!!! I have a very strong prescription!!! I paid less than $70.00 for my glasses and my glasses honestly run $400.-$600 . The quality and design is absolutely amazing. You can tell that they care about your eyes. I received an email from the customer service because my prescription was incorrect and I got it corrected. Talk about customer service huh!!! I would recommend Firmoo Firm to anyone and they will definitely take care of you.
